text: Branko Crvenkovski ( ; born 12 October 1962) is a Macedonian politician. He was Prime Minister of Macedonia from 1992 to 1998 and again from 2002 to 2004, and as President of Macedonia from 2004 to 2009. He decided not to run for re- election in 2009. Crvenkovski was also leader of the Social Democratic Union of Macedonia. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of North Macedonia Category:Prime Ministers of North Macedonia
title: Branko Crvenkovski
